name: kui-shell
description: This is the monorepo for Kui, the hybrid command-line/GUI electron-based Kubernetes tool

scripts.pty:electron: rm -f .npmrc; cp packages/kui-builder/npmrc node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc && npm run pty:rebuild
scripts.build:configure: CLIENT=${CLIENT-default}; rm node_modules/@kui-shell/settings/config-dev.json; npm run -s pty:electron && CLIENT_HOME=./clients/$CLIENT node packages/kui-builder/lib/configure.js && CLIENT_HOME=./clients/$CLIENT ./packages/kui-builder/dist/dev/build.sh && CLIENT_HOME=./clients/$CLIENT ./packages/kui-builder/bin/seticon.js
scripts.build:electron-for-development: npm run -s build:configure && npm run -s compile && for i in plugins/*; do if [ -d $i/node_modules ]; then (cd build/plugins/`basename $i` && rm -rf node_modules && cp -a ../../../$i/node_modules .); fi; done
scripts.postinstall: npm run -s build:hoist && npm run -s build:electron-for-development
scripts.watch:webpack: export CLIENT=${CLIENT-default}; npm run -s build:configure && npm run -s pty:nodejs && if [ ! -d node_modules/webpack ]; then echo "$(tput setaf 1)!!! re-run WEBPACK=true npm install$(tput sgr0)"; exit 1; fi && rm -rf clients/$CLIENT/dist/webpack && mkdir -p clients/$CLIENT/dist/webpack/css && (cd clients/$CLIENT/dist/webpack && ln -s ../../theme/icons && ln -s ../../theme/images && cd css && for i in ../../../../../packages/app/web/css/*; do ln -s $i; done && for i in ../../../theme/css/*; do ln -s $i; done); (cd node_modules/@kui-shell/settings && rm -f config-dev.json; if [ -f ../../../clients/$CLIENT/theme/config.json ]; then echo "linking config-dev.json"; cp ../../../clients/$CLIENT/theme/config.json config-dev.json; fi) && export KUI_MONO_HOME=$(cd ./ && pwd); if [ -z "$TRAVIS_JOB_ID" ]; then PROGRESS="--progress"; fi; webpack-dev-server $PROGRESS --config packages/webpack/webpack.config.js
